comments:
It's not possible to start Eclipse build I20030115 on an NT 4.0 worstation with 
latest SP.

Even with a fresh installation and fresh workspace it is not possible. The 
Eclipse launcher is started and starts the VM. In the VM console window I can 
see a SWT exception "no more handles" but I can't view it because the console 
disappears really fast after the stack trace.

Thanks, Gunnar

got the stack trace:
